story_27_53000/2401_1001_0100_10: I think this is it...the beach where we first met.
story_27_53000/2401_1001_0200_10:
After all these years, I hope it still lives
around here...
story_27_53000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Wait—did you just drop that on my head?!
I’m a prince, you know!
story_27_53000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You can’t just go around hitting me with things!
That sort of behavior could be considered a
crime! Inexcusable!
story_27_53000/2401_1001_0800_10:
As punishment for your rude conduct, you will
cooperate with me on a new project I’m starting.
story_27_53000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m calling it the Pokémon Masters League!
